predicate.note: Frames file for 'thump' based on sentences in brown.

example.name: tub thumping
example.text: In an ideological argument, [the participants]-1 tend [*-1] to thump the table.

example.name: intransitive
example.text: It was nothing, though his heart was thumping wildly.

example.name: with path
example.text: At 7:25 [two hotel doormen]-2 came [*-2] thumping down the steps, carrying a saw-horse to be set up as a barricade in front of the haberdashery store window next to the entranceway ...
example.arg: carrying a saw-horse to be set up as a barricade in front of the haberdashery store window next to the entranceway...
